summary: 1999  was a common year starting on Friday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Sunshine Parker  was an American actor. He was born as Lloyd Olen Parker in Lawn, Texas.
He is best known for his roles as Emmet in Road House and Edgar Deems in Tremors. He typically played minor roles as either a "bum" or an "old codger/geezer" stock character.
title: Sunshine Parker
